#summary Overview of installation options

= Introduction =

The !BigBlueButton 0.8 server runs under Ubuntu 10.04 32-bit or 64-bit.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:

    * [InstallationUbuntu Install from packages] (recommended)
    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download the BigBlueButton Virtual Machine]

If you are new to !BigBlueButton, please read some of the [TechnicalOverview overview pages] to understand !BigBlueButton's architecture.
